examples: in Germany, repos usually run for about one month

noun.description: A car or other item which has been repossessed.
examples: I've got a repo for you—'85 Maxima

verb.description: Repossess (a car or other item) when a buyer defaults on payments.
examples: she's from the collection agency, come to repo the car

origin: 1950s: abbreviation. The verb dates from the 1970s.
